wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Learn about our Team and Culture
We are a team of dedicated professionals, ready to do what ever it takes to make your business grow.

item.title: Archives
item.dc:creator: Bluxart_Admin_Klaus
item.content:encoded:
Archives Template

This theme comes packed with a simple archives template. To use it, simply create a new page and select “Archives” page template in the Page Attributes menu – the archive lists will automatically display below any page content. Lists include the last 30 posts, archives by month and archives by subject. [az_blank_divider_sh height_value="30" class=""]

item.title: Sitemap
item.dc:creator: Bluxart_Admin_Klaus
item.content:encoded:
Sitemap Template

This theme comes packed with a simple sitemap template. To use it, simply create a new page and select “Sitemap” page template in the Page Attributes menu – the archive lists will automatically display below any page content. Lists include the last 30 posts, and all pages. [az_blank_divider_sh height_value="30" class=""]

[az_testimonial_section] [testimonial title="John Doe, Click LLC" id="testimonial-1"]Working with Klaus was a delight from start to finish. They worked hard to fulfil our requests and we are very happy with our product.[/testimonial] [testimonial title="Billy Brand, CEO" id="testimonial-2"]Awesome to work with Klaus. Incredibly organized, easy to communicate with, responsive with next iterations, and beautiful work.[/testimonial] [testimonial title="Sonia Sales, Product Manager" id="testimonial-3"]Thank you for all your help and assistance over the years with our products. I would have no hesitation in recommending you to my clients.[/testimonial] [/az_testimonial_section]

item.title: Tutorials
item.dc:creator: Bluxart_Admin_Klaus
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row section_mode="normal" bgmode="default" section_overlay="no_overlay" sectionoverlayopacity="0.70" bgposition="top_left" bgrepeat="no-repeat" bgattachment="scroll" video_opacity_overlay="0.70" padding="custom-padding" padding_top_value="70" padding_bottom_value="40" shadow="shadow-off"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][az_lightbox_video image="769" animation_loading="no" animation_loading_effects="fade_in" link_url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fbbEbOyF7AU" title="Klaus - Getting Started" gallery_name="tutorials"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text animation_loading="no" animation_loading_effects="fade_in"]

Getting  Started

An introductory video on how to proceed with the installation of the theme. Following these simple steps you will have a working version of the demo with the same contents, where you can modify to suit your needs.
  • Theme Install
  • Install Required Plugins
  • Import Demo Content (XML)
  • Import Revolution Slider Settings
  • Simple Setup Pages
NOTE: For see the video in HD click play, when the video started click on settings icon on youtube player bar ( cog icon ) and select 1080HD Resolution.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][az_divider div_type="normal" margin_top_value="30" margin_bottom_value="56" animation_loading="no" animation_loading_effects="fade_in"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][az_lightbox_video image="773" animation_loading="no" animation_loading_effects="fade_in" link_url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xebG_Ey_WXc" title="Klaus - Theme Options Panel" gallery_name="tutorials"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text animation_loading="no" animation_loading_effects="fade_in"]

Theme Options Panel

An introductory video on how to proceed with the Klaus Theme Options Panel. So many options to configure through this panel easy to manage, each field has comments to help you in case of you need an info.
NOTE: For see the video in HD click play, when the video started click on settings icon on youtube player bar ( cog icon ) and select 1080HD Resolution.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][az_divider div_type="normal" margin_top_value="30" margin_bottom_value="56" animation_loading="no" animation_loading_effects="fade_in"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][az_lightbox_video image="774" animation_loading="no" animation_loading_effects="fade_in" link_url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdqxaswWUyo" title="Klaus - Page Builder Basics" gallery_name="tutorials"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text animation_loading="no" animation_loading_effects="fade_in"]

Page Builder Basics

An introductory video on how to proceed with the Klaus Theme Options (for page, post, portfolio, team) and how to work the Page Builder. So many options to configure through this page builder and shortcodes easy to manage, each field has comments to help you in case of you need an info.
NOTE: For see the video in HD click play, when the video started click on settings icon on youtube player bar ( cog icon ) and select 1080HD Resolution.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][az_divider div_type="normal" margin_top_value="30" margin_bottom_value="56" animation_loading="no" animation_loading_effects="fade_in"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][az_lightbox_video image="796" animation_loading="no" animation_loading_effects="fade_in" link_url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mu7GZWHUorc" title="Klaus - Portfolio and Portfolio Item Setup" gallery_name="tutorials"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text animation_loading="no" animation_loading_effects="fade_in"]

Portfolio & Portfolio Item Setup

An introductory video on how to proceed with the creation of Portfolio Page and Portfolio Item. The possibilities are endless, this is just a small preview of what will Klaus has to offer. I recommend that you also read the guide for more details and information about it.
  • Setup Porfolio
  • Setup Portfolio Full Width
  • Setup Grid/Masonry/Wall Layout
  • Setup Portfolio Items
  • Setup Fancybox Image, Video and Gallery Images ( Reads the doc for more information )
NOTE: For see the video in HD click play, when the video started click on settings icon on youtube player bar ( cog icon ) and select 1080HD Resolution.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Contact Form Klaus
item.dc:creator: Bluxart_Admin_Klaus
item.content:encoded:
Your Name (required)
[text* your-name]

Your Email (required)
[email* your-email]

Subject
[text your-subject]

Budget
[select budget class:selectpicker "less $5000" "$5000 - $7500" "$7500 - $10000" "$10000 - $15000" "more than $15000"]

Your Message
[textarea your-message]

[submit "Send Your Email"]
